## MapFlyTool class

飞行实现类

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MapFlyTool extends ToolBase<ToolBaseOptions, MapFlyToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;ToolBaseOptions, [MapFlyToolEvents](./cesium.mapflytoolevents)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new MapFlyTool({})
tool.enable()
tool.eventBus.on('time-change', e => {
  console.log(e)
})
tool.eventBus.on('flying-change', e => {
  console.log(e)
})

tool.initRoute([...])

const seconds = tool.getFlyDuration()
tool.play()
// tool.stop()

tool.setView(value)

tool.destroy()
```

## Methods

| Method                                                              | Modifiers | Description                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------- |
| [clear()](./cesium.mapflytool.clear)                             |           | 清空当前飞行场景             |
| [destroy()](./cesium.mapflytool.destroy)                         |           | 销毁                         |
| [enable()](./cesium.mapflytool.enable)                           |           | 启用                         |
| [getFlyDuration()](./cesium.mapflytool.getflyduration)           |           | 获取当前飞行场景总时长（秒） |
| [initRoute(route, handleHeading)](./cesium.mapflytool.initroute) |           | 初始化飞行路线               |
| [play()](./cesium.mapflytool.play)                               |           | 开始飞行                     |
| [setView(sceonds)](./cesium.mapflytool.setview)                  |           | 定位到提供秒数的飞行位置     |
| [stop()](./cesium.mapflytool.stop)                               |           | 飞行中止                     |
